thread.title: This place is not very professional. Stay away
thread.title_full: This place is not very professional. Stay away - Review of San Francisco Airport Marriott Waterfront, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Sean B
title: This place is not very professional. Stay away
text:
I am very pissed. There has been problem after problem at this place. I am a Platinum Elite member and apparently that has no value at this hotel. I left my credit card at the restaurant when I paid my check and it was an ordeal to get someone to help me. Even the front desk girl was flustered... it took 4 phone calls and it was like a problem for them to help. Then I was in a rush to head to the airport and I was asking for a cab or should I book uber they said no, no we can drive you. So I didn't get an uber or cab and after waiting 8 minutes they said oops! Our guy can't take you! Wth??? I am about to miss my flight. Thanks for all the customer love.
I will never stay at this hotel... ever. Be careful people. It's a nice looking hotel but....
